techmeme.title: Thoughts on Apple Intelligence's ability to outsource compute to Apple's servers with cryptographic guarantees of privacy, prompt injection risks, and more (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Apple says Apple Intelligence is free and works with iOS 18 on iPhone 15 Pro, and macOS 15 and iPadOS 17 on devices with M1 or up; Vision Pro is not supported (Tim Hardwick/MacRumors)
Apple plans to bring ChatGPT to Siri and its other apps later in 2024; users will be asked before questions are sent to ChatGPT and don't need an OpenAI account (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Apple announces Genmoji, an Apple Intelligence-powered iOS 18 feature to let users create their own custom emoji using text prompts in the Messages app (Joe Rossignol/MacRumors)
Apple updates Siri, powered by Apple Intelligence: more personal, on-screen awareness, a new API for third-party apps, and more, coming "over the next year" (Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac)
